price: Hanyuma Nyagasani we aramutoranya, yakira ukwicuza kwe aranamuyobora.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
